IS445(AOG) - Data Viz

This is the course website for IS445(AOG) in Fall 2020

Week 8 - Maps, maps and more maps

We will start thinking about maps & map projection, both in bqplot and matplotlib and with geopandas+contextily. Weâ€™ll continue this week with building dashboards of mappable data.

Downloads

Data:

  • The UFO Sitings Dataset (13Mb) - ufo-scrubbed-geocoded-time-standardized-00.csv
  • State export data (8Kb) - total_export.csv
  • Backup: Surgery Charges Dataset (37Mb) - market_map_data.csv
  • Earthquake sensor data (59Mb) - data_tohoku_norm_transpose.csv
  • Earthquake locations data (12Kb) - location.txt

Resources:

  • State export utilities (Python library) - states_utils.py
  • US State abbreviations (Python library) - us_state_abbrev.py

Optional reading list

  1. VAD Ch. 8.1-8.3: Arrange Spatial Data
  2. FDV, Ch. 15: Visualizing geospatial data
  3. VAD, Ch. 13.4.2: Reduce Items and Attributes
  4. Cartopy docs; ipyleaflet docs; Geopandas Docs
